thread.title: WILLIAM

author: WILLIAM
title: WILLIAM
text:
Great course. I think this course should bee mandatory for every licensed driver to take every three years! The driving situations were good examples of conditions and situations that all drivers experience. It took many hours to complete the course but it was presented clearly in every module and the tests following each part were fair and logical.
Great example of resourceful online training.
Bill Neville
